attributes.description:
“Making the Impossible Possible” – Mazda JHB South
We are the premium Mazda dealership in Johannesburg with service excellence at our core. 
All our new Mazda vehicles come with a 3 year / unlimited km Warranty and Service plan. 
All our approved used vehicles have been through a multi-point check and are of the highest quality. Please send us an online inquiry for the fastest response.
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 9 470.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 53 820.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.
attributes.options:
An unmistakable eye-catching allure. All about the drive.
Features include:
Engine power output: 121Kw/213Nm – 2.0Litre in-line 4 cylinder 16 valve DOHC S-VT Petrol (SKYACTIV-G) with i-stop; Adaptive LED Headlamps; Daytime Running Lamps (DRL); Rear Combination Lamps (RCL); Front rain-sensing wipers; Smart Advanced Keyless entry; Auto fold mirrors; ABS; EBD; EBA; 7 Airbags SRS: Front (driver, passenger, knee, side and curtain); Advanced keyless push-button engine start; Head-Up Display (HUD); E
attributes.title: 2022 Mazda 3 2.0 Astina Auto 5-dr
